query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `candidate_skills` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`candidate_id` int NOT NULL,
	`technical` text,
	`soft` text,
	`languages` text,
	`certifications` text,
	`tools` text,
	`extracted_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `candidate_skills_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `skills_match_results` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`candidate_id` int NOT NULL,
	`job_id` int,
	`match_score` int NOT NULL,
	`matched_skills` text,
	`missing_skills` text,
	`additional_skills` text,
	`recommendation` enum('excellent','good','fair','poor') NOT NULL,
	`technical_match` int,
	`soft_skills_match` int,
	`languages_match` int,
	`certifications_match` int,
	`tools_match` int,
	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	CONSTRAINT `skills_match_results_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

	`updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `skills_match_results` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`candidate_id` int NOT NULL,
	`job_id` int,

	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
